Welcome to Maptime SLC. We get together about once a month to learn about making maps in the modern world.

OpenStreetMap Edit-a-thon This Saturday

22 Apr 2014

I am excited to announce our first event - the OpenStreetMap Spring Edit-a-thon! We are taking part in a this nationwide event aimed at improving OpenStreetMap, the free wiki world map, everywhere.

People editing OpenStreetMap at a previous Edit-a-thon, photo by Alan McConchie

We will gather at Joffee's Coffees this Saturday at 2PM. Come out and map the world!

If you have never edited OpenStreetMap before, come and learn! Bring your laptop and a mouse if you have one. If you want, you can sign up for OpenStreetMap now and start looking around.

Here's a great video that will show you the basics of editing OpenStreetMap. It is by the MapGive campaign and aimed at mapping for humanitarian causes, but even if you want to edit the map right here in Utah, this video has good instructions.
